add.foreign: magister tho vaus et dominus W. monylaw protestacio ex parte decani et capellani

div.p:
The xvj day of marche the yer' et cetera lxxii In presence of the aldirman baillies and certane of common'
consel of this burgh Maister Thomas vaus chantour of murref and chanon' of
Aberdone and ser William monylaw chaplane of the said kirk of aberdon'
in the name of the dene and hail cheptour of Aberdone made protestacione and
opinly protestit in Jugement that the mail of the land clamit be margaret
mason' in the name and on the behalfe of Johne gray or tobe clamit be ony
vthiris tweching the lande or tenement liand betuix the lande of ser thomas
hervy chaplane on theta part and the lande of William club on the tothir part
the quhilk now Nicol baxtar inhabitis be vnpait or deliuerit til ony
person' belanging to the said Johne gray or til ony vthiris . bot anerly
til the said dene and cheptour of aberdon' as thai that has maist rycht and
reson' tharto . vnto the tyme that it be notorly kennyt that he schaw his
haldin and quhat rycht the h said Johne gray has of the properte and possession'
of the said lande and grownde with the pertinencis or ellis that the mail of the said
lande exceppand twa merkis acht yerely til the cathedrale kirk of of aberdon
tharof be spendit apon the Reparaling and wphalding of the said tenement
eftir the sycht and be avise of wourthy nychbouris of this towne

Item in presence of the aldirman and consel in the tolbuthe the day before writin Margaret mason' as
laghfull procuratrice til Johne gray son' and ayr til vmquhile gilbert mason burges of this burgh
has substitute and ordanit Adam of craufurde burges of the said burgh procuratour'
and factour' in hir absence for the said Johne graa with full power' to ask and ressa
ue for the said Johne and in his name full commpt rekning and payment of Nicol
baxtar' nychtbour of this towne of he maillis feirmys and dewiteis pertening
to the said Johne of all yeris and termys bygane for his lande and tene
ment set and to ferme lattyn be him to the said Nicol the quhilk the said
Nicol now inhabitis sen his tak and intraa into the said land with the pertinencis eftir the
tenour of the Indenturis or evidentis made betuix the saidis partiis tharwpon And in
like wis' totak sik compt' and payment of him in tym tocum alslang as he remainnis
with the said land with the pertinencis / Giffand to the said Adam alsmekle power' as sche has
or may hafe of the said Johne todo for him in his absence and hirris et cetera

Andreas Luss' per assisam convictus in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi murray spon
in domo sororis dicti andree Et simili modo Idem Willelmus in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti
andree et hoc in sua defensione prout deliberatus fuit per assisam Et emendabit alter alteri
Item andreas culan deuenit plegius balliuo pro dictis partibus ab alterutro indempnis
seruandis aliter quam secundum Juris formam

The assise has deliuerit and ordanit that sa mony personis and frachtismen as Magnus
Wormot feit and hyrit tosail in Thomas nortonys schip in Ingland with salmond'
that he sal content and pay thame and til ilkane of thaim thare hyre and
furingis eftir as he condicionit thame in the name of the said thomas norton'
Inglisman videlicet xij d' Inglis for the fracht of ilke barel eftir as the
Aldirman and common' consel has ordand thame tobe paijt as law wil and
within laghfull tyme

Eodem die Matheus cowpar in presencia tocius curie extendit plegium super Johannem Wormot in
manibus Johannis vaus vnius bedelli quod iniuste detinet ab eodem l s' super quibus
dictus Johannes pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum qui sibi conceditur per curiam hodie ad octo dies

The same day the aldirman and consel sittand with thame the said maistir Thomas vaus
chanon of aberdone has determynit and ordand Nicol baxtar thare present in the
consel hous' of the tolbuthe tomak full compt Rekning and payment til margaret
mason as laghfull procuratrice literaly constitute be Johne gray son' and ayr til gilbert mason
quhilum burges of this toune and for him of the malis and dewiteis pertening til the said
Johne for his lande or tenement set and to ferme lattyn to the said Nicol in the quhilk
now he remainnis and dwellis liand as forsaid is / of all termys and yeris
bygane sen his intrometting tharwith eftir the fourme of the Indenturis made
betuix the forsaidis Johne and necol tharwpon'

Die xviii marcij Dauid symson burgensis huius burgi deuenit plegius legalis pro Duncano
iacobi commorante in parochia de aufurd ad intrandum eundem Duncanum coram preposito et communi consilio sub
premunicione octo dierum subeundum detencionem eorum pro offensa per dictum Duncanum contra burgum facta in contrarium
quod se intromisit et presens fuit tempore perturbacionis domini Willelmi scot capellani et cetera

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio decimonono die marcij anno predicto quo die curia affirmata
Johannes andree et Dauid de Kyntor burgenses huius burgi in presencia prepositi et tocius curia deue
nerunt debitores Wilelmo hay burgense dicti burgi coniunctim et divisim pro summa vndecim
librarum grossorum monete flandrie videlicet ipsorum quilibet pro dimedia dicte summe xj li' g'
soluendum dicto Willelmo ut subsequitur scilicet ad pascha proximo futuro viginti libras vsualis
monete regni scocie proporcionatas inter eosdem / et Residuum integre summe ad festum penthecostes
inde proximum et immediate sequentem in dicta vsuali moneta istius Regni veluti appunctuatum et
concordatum est inter dictas partes sine vlteriori prorogacione qualitercumque per eosdem facientj

Eodem die Joha Andreas lammyntone convictus per assisam de amerciamento curie pro iniusta percussione et vilipensione
mariote sangstar' et tenetur emendare parti lese ad visum proborum

Die sabbato vicesimo die marcii Thomas ymlau pistor in amerciamento curie per confessionem propriam
pro iniusta fractione communis ordinacionis non obseruato recto pondere panum frumenti per eundem et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem vicesimo secundo die marcij anno et cetera lxxiio

quo die
curia affirmata In presencia prepositi ballivorum et tocius curie Dauid galichtly burgensis huius
burgi deuenit debitor Gilberto murison vicino eiusdem ville ad satisfaciendum sibi
ad festum pasche proximo futuro sex solidos penes plegiacionem in quam idem Dauid traxit se
dicto gilberto pro vino recepto comitj de marr'

Eodem die Jacobus neffe posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro perturbacione ville
cum domino Willelmo scot capellano in verbo

Alexander fresar' in fotino convictus per assisam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi
lyntoune piscatorum de fotino Et simili modo dictus Willelmus in amerciamento pro perturbacione
dicti alexandri et emendabi ipsorum quilibet alter ad visum proborum / Pro quibus perturbacionibus
prefatus alexander iniungitur soluere pro emenda ad missam Sancti sanguinis duas libras cere
et dictus Willelmus vnam libram cere Insuper dicta assisa cum assensu prepositi et bal
liuorum eorundem ordinacione deliberavit quod quis predictorum duorum primo offendit altri
et desuper per assisam convictus fuerit soluet ad fabricam beati nicholai quadra
ginta solidos absque remissione et cetera

Die vicesimotercio marcij anno et cetera lxxijo Alexander hay posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum
de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Dauid galichtly vicini huius ville et tenetur emen
dare eidem iuxta consideracionem proborum Et simili modo dictus Dauid in amerciamento convictus per
assisam pro perturbacione dicti alexandri in verbo et emendabit eidem ut supra

Item dictus Dauid galichly adiudicatur per assisam convictus in amerciamento curie pro remocione iniusta lane
Walteri murison ad clauem et emendabit in quantum deliquit

Thomas Prat adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicti Dauid galichlie et emendabit
dampnum ad discrecionem prepositi et communis consilij

Iniungitur prefatis alexandro hay et Thome prat per prepositum et consilium pro offensa per eosdem facta
contra Dauid galichly in partem emende contribuere duas libras cere misse sancti
sanguinis videlicet ipsorum quilibet vnam libram

Eodem die Andreas branche posuit se in voluntate prepositi et balliuorum pro iniusta
perturbacione Johannis vaus vnius balliuorum huius burgj propter quam ad
iudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit dampnum ad ordinem prepositj et communis consilij
et dedit Willelmum de Kyntor plegium legalem de indempnitate dicti ballivi aliter
quam secundum Juris formam

Dictus Johannes vaus balliuus accusatus per prepositum et balliuos de perturbacione iniusta
prefati Andree branche / negauit omnem iniustam perturbacionem eiusdem submittendo
se a assise desuper electe / que mature aduisata et Jurata decreuit et
deliberavit memoratum Johannem vaus quitum et per eandem assisam purgatum
ab omni perturbio iniusta prefati andree Et dictus Johannes vaus dedit
Johannem de mar patrem plegium legalem pro eo quod antedictus andreas erit indempnis
pro dicto Johannem preterquam communem viam Juris
In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio burgi de Aberdene xxiiijo die marcij anno supradicto

quo die curia affirmata Johannes vormot adiudicatur in amerciamento de libertate assisa pro
iniusta detencione triginta solidorum a matheo cowpar quam summam tenetur satisfacere eidem
infra terminum Juris

Eodem die Thomas branche per assisam Juratam convictus est de perturbacione iniusta
Johannis seruientis Dauid blabre et emendabit dampnum ad visum proborum et cetera

The said xxiiii day of marche It is decretit and deliuerit be the Aldirman and the common consel that
forThere is a manicula in the left margin, with a finger pointing to 'for'. the offence and strublance done be Androw branche againnis Johne the vaus ane of
the baillies in the tyme for the quhilk strublance and offence he was convict be his
avn' grant ane sworne assise / the said androw for emendis and assithe of the said Iniure
In the first he sal cum on sunday next tocum to sanct Nicholes kirk in the vestry
with a walx candil of twa pundis . and offer it before the hie altar in tyme
of the hiemes with vthir mendis that the said androw has made in the tolbuthe
to the towne and the partie And gif that it be fundin in tyme fortocum that the said
Androw mak ony sik offence or strublance til othir offisar' or ony vthir man
within this burgh in his defaute and tharwpon convict he salbe exilit and bannist
oute of this burgh eftir as the fourme of law askis and requiris / and at the
leist for a yer' and day And thir ar the names of thaim present at the said consel
Androw scherar aldirman Thomas fif henry ruthirfurd and Robert blindsel thre
of the baillies Richard of Kyntor Johne of marr' Androw alanson alexander meig
nes alexander blindsel Robert of culan Dauid colison Johne Wormot gilbert
of chavmer alexander rede Wil the hay Wat murison thom prat Edmond
lowson William of Kyntor William blindzele gilbert murison

In curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die marcij
anno et cetera lxxiiio

quo die curia affirmata marioria scot per assisam convicta de
perturbacione mariote breklau adiudicabatur in amerciamento curie et pro percussione eiusdem
Simili modo dicta mariota in amerciamento pro perturbacione prefate mariorie

Die crastina Duncanus stokar accusatus per ballivos de perturbacione iniusta et
percussione mariote breklau posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro dicta ca
lumpnia et ideo adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendature eedem ad visum proborum

In curia legali balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio die lune xxixo
die marcij anno et cetera lxxiijo

quo die Johannes Dawson coram balliuis in pretorio
obligauit se et promisit satisfacere uel satisfieri facere Duncano tailyour'
vicino huius ville infra hinc et festum penthecostes proximo futuro viginti
duos solidos et sex denarios pro plegiagio in quo dictus Johannes deuenit
eidem Duncano pro Wilelmo lesly

The same day William of panton in petmethen before the baillie in plane court
has made constitute and ordand Schir patrik layng chaplane and Johne
Dawson burges of this burgh coniunctlie and seueralie his procuratouris actoris
factouris and speciale deputis toaske and Ressaue fra Alexander rede and his
spouse all gudis and ayrschip pertening til theeldast son' and ayr of Johne
mathison quhilum burges of this burgh / And todo and vse all vthir and
sindrie thingis for him and the said barne belanging the Ressauing and asking
of his ayrchip and gudis rychtwisly pertening til him as the said William
mycht do and he war bodely present he haldand and sal haulde ferme and
stable et cetera

Item the day forsaid Schir Johne of yet penitenciar to my lord of Aberdene
be the deliuerence of his club in the handis of Johne the vaus ane of the bail
lies sittand in Jugement has frely resignit deliuerit and our'gefin to Dauid
mathison burges of Aberdene William mathouson seconde son' til quhilum
Johne mathison brothir to the said Dauid baith lande and gudis pertening til
the said William be the decesse of his fadir the said Dauid fyndand gude
suffisant souertie and borowis to the aldirman baillies and consel of this burgh
that the said barnys land and gudis salbe furthcumand and put to the vtilite and
proffite of him Giffand to the said Dauid siclike power' as he had
has or may hafe anent the said barne and his governing and fortoask
and ressaue the land and all gudis pertening til the said barne fra Alexander
rede and the modir of the said William spous' to the said Alexander

Item the same day the aldirman becaus' of gret besynes that he had
ado with the Abbot of arbroth as Justice in the said Abbotis court of Justry /
has continewit and gert contineu be wourde sende with the seriand to the
baillie the desire of this day betuix William of panton and ser Johne of
yet on theta part and alexander rede on thetothir part tweching Johne
mathisonis twa barnys and the deliuering of thare gudis to remayn in
the same fourme and effect as the Act made tharwpon gangand before beris
quhil friday that next cumis til the presence of him and the consel as it was
ordand tilhafe beyn this day but ony preiudice of party et cetera

And Richard of culan the said day before the bailliez sittand in Jugement
has protestit and askit eftir the tenour of the Act and peroffer that ser Johne of
yet made of before in presence of the aldirman and consel the deliuerence and
tutoury of William mathoson second son' til quhilum Johne mathison
burges of this towne and of the said barnys gudis as he that allegis
sulde hafe him be verteu of the said Act and peroffer as nerrar' til
him than ony vthir that desirit him of before he fyndand sik souer
tie as forsaid is for the barnys lande and gudis et cetera And protestit that quhat
thing ser Johne of yet had doone in contrare heirof sulde nocht stop him of this peticione and peroffer et cetera

Eodem die patricius badenagh calumpniauit Mariotam clerk Relictam Johannis
henrici culan per plegium extensum in manu bedelli de vna concchia concha
argentea wlgariter nuncupata le pece quam calumpniam dicta mariota negavit
submittendo se determinandum assise / que quidem assisa mature et diligenter avisata
decreuit et deliberavit dictam mariotam restituere sive deliberare
non debere dicto patricio dictam concham argenteam sed ipsam mariotam de cetero
exoneratam fore a calumpnia predicta penes eandem concham deliberarunt et finaliter
concluserunt et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem penultimo die marcij anno et cetera lxxiijo

quo
die curia affirmata Andreas atkyn posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum de amerciamento
pro iniusta perturbacione curie / robuste et dispersonaliter loquendo nicholao baxtar in dictorum
prepositi et balliuorum presencia

Eodem die alexander trail Willelmus lowson Johannes stewart and angusius ihoneson
arbitri electi et Jurati inter gilbertum vaus prosequentem ab vna et Johannem Wellis
partibus ex altera cum consensu parcium super quinque s' et iiijor d' clamat' per dictum gilbertum nomine
et ex parte vxoris sue a dicto Johanne qui quidem arbitri mature aduisati deliberarunt et
ordinauerunt dictum Johannem Wellis soluere debere et teneri sponse prefati
gilberti et sibi gilberto ipsius nomine et ex parte memoratos v s' et iiijor d' satisfaciend'
eosdem infra terminum Juris

Die mercurie vltimo die marcij anno supradicto Mariota gudefallou per assisam iuratam
adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione iniusta sponse thome androson manentis in fotino
et tenetur emendare eedem ad visum proborum

Agneta litstar' in amerciamento per assisam convicta de perturbacione iniusta et percussione Mariorie
skipparty vsque ad blam et emendabit ut supra

Eodem die vxor Johannis fichet de le key similiter convicta per assisam de perturbacione vnius
mulieris seruientis alexandro trail adiudicatur in amerciamento emendabitque dampnum parti lese

Item quedam ancilla famula thome androson de fotino per assisam convicta de amerciamento curie pro
perturbacione iniusta Mariote gudefalou eciam emendabit dampnum

Adiungitur agnete litstar per prepositum et balliuos ex deliberacione assise pro percussione et
magna perturbacione Mariorie skipparty in emendam soluere et contribuere dicte
mariorie antequam recedat de pretorio duos solidos et dimediam libram cere ad
missam sancti sanguinis / et alios ii s' eciam dicte mariorie inter hinc et festum pasche proximo venturo

Joneta filia andree manens in strabolgy in pretorio predicto die coram Johanne vaus vno ballivorum
constituit Andream galty burgensem huius burgi suum procuratorem ad iuridice prosequendum nomine et ex
parte dicte constitutis sponsam thome symson super duabus vlnis panni albi lanei vltra delibe
rat' eedem ad tingendum per dictam constitutem et de super se necesse fuerit plegios
inueniend' et dictum pannum recuperand' et recipiend' ad vsum constitutis cum vniuersis aliis
clausulis tali procuratori necessarijs et oportunis promitten' Ratum et gratum et cetera

Die secundo Aprilis Murthacus glenmalin filius et heres apparens Johannis glenmalvin Recep
tus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis prestito
v s' solito Juramento et Soluit preposito in alba bursa v s' pro dicta libertate

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xo die februarii
Anno Domini et cetera lxxxv /

quo die ballivi assignarunt hodie ad quindenam Andree
culan iuniori ad respondendum Johanni fichet pro v modijs wadij precii bolle xlv s' et pro
x s' argenti tanquam in termino peremptorio vtraque parti assignat' ad onerandum Jura sua
prout voluerint illo die perdere et lucrari

xvj die februarii In curia ballivorum Johannes talyour amerciatur pro iniusta inuencione plegij super tho
mam gren scissorem penes certos grossos anglicanos et ipse thomas quitus a calumpnia sua imperpetuum

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xvij dai of february Jhon'
talyour convict be assis' was adiugit in amerciament for the strublance of Wat trumpat and
his hous' and til amend sa fer as he has scathit be the sicht of gude men

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die februarij
anno Domini supradicto / quo die curia affirmata et cetera

the samen dai It is ordanit be ane assise that gif the flescharis in tym cuming or
ony of thaim byis ony fisch before the hour' of xij or byis thame vteu the portis
or brekkis thaim derrer than a penny the schilling / that thai and ilkane of thaim being
convict tharof sal gif j li' of wax to the haly blude lycht / and that the ballies sal rais'
thare vnlawis of thaim but fauouris togiddir with the vnlawis of certane flescharis
convict of the said poyntis quhilkis ar remittit at this tym at the instance of the
assis' apon thare gude bering et cetera

Johannes chepman senior secundo die vocatus ad sectam Alexandri scrogis non comparuit / quare preci
pitur philippo Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum ab eodem vel a suo caucionario
et premunire ipsum Johannem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam 3m diem processus

xxjo die februarii coram ballivis in curia / marioria sponsa Johannis glenmalvin constituit mur
thacum glenmaluin suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Jonetam menyeis pro vij grossis anglicanis
eedem inuadiatis pro vij s' in latissima forma procuratorij

the samen dai the ballies for waiknes of the court and obiection of the party has delayit
the taking of the prefis quhilkis huchon swaynson tuke to produce this day / that
the bote is his that William cryne has intromettit with / vnto this next thurisdai
And has warnit the said William tocum that dai to here the said prefis sworn
with Intimacion that quhethir he cum or nocht / the balyeis wil procede in the taking
of the said preif

Item the said William cryne protestit that quhat thing the ballies did in the forsaid
action suld tvrn him to na preiudice sen he avowit the bote til a warrand et cetera

the second' dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv It is ordanit and statute be the Aldir
man counsale and brethir of gild of this burgh for the common' profite of the samen / that in
tym tocum for this yer' / thar salbe na ail sauld derrer' within the burgh than sex d'
the galloun and iiijor d' eftir as it salbe sene of vail / And that nane sel for vj
penneis the gallon' bot free men / and al vnfre folkis for four' d' nothir tobe sauld'
within the hous' nor vteu fra tusdai furth . that next cumis vndir the pain of se
cluding of thaim fra that office for this yer' and of the vnlawis tobe rasyt but
fauouris

Item that the baxtaris sal mak the penny laif of xxtj vncis / and the twa penny laif of
xl vncis thareftir / the sowat xvj vncis / the craknel xij vncis And that thai
baik laiffis and vthir breid for half penneis corespondand to the said paas'
And this tobe done of al breid that is vnbakyn

Item that na fleschar' salby salmond' nor gretlyne fisch' nothir eftir none na
before none tobrek to the vail of thaim bot that thai sal brek it for a penny
of the schilling that the communite salby vndir the pain of eschete of the fisch
that beis fundin with thame togiddir with the vnlau tobe pait vnforgevin

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vjto die marcij
anno Domini supradicto / quo die curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Johannes chepman senior tercio die vocatus ad sectam Alexandri scrogis / non
comparuit / quare philippus Dunbrek seriendus distringebat Johannem vaus suum caucio
narum tunc in curia presentem / et premuniuit eundem ad intrandum dictum Johannem chepman
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et diem peremptorium huius processus

Item sponsa fyndelai fores super quam Thomas de narn extendit plegium pro
iniusta detencione v s' orum et vltra ab eodem / vocata ad respondendum dicto plegio / non
comparuit / quare precipitur seriendo quod capto districto a dicta sponsa ipsam summoneat
ad comparendum in curia ballivorum huius burgi die veneris proximo futuro tanquam in
termino peremptorio per decretum curie assignat' ad respondendum in dicta causa et cetera

In the court haldin be the baillies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the vij dai of marche
patrik andirson strekit ane borgh apon James of Kyntor that wrangwisly
he withhaldis fra him ane goldyn lew that he lent him / twa xiiij penny
grotis and jc hessil wandis / And til ansuer' tharto the said James askit lachful
dai / and thar wes assignit til him monundai cum viij dais for dai peremtpour
til answer' to the said borgh

The xj dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxv the Aldirman counsale and
communite of Abirdene that mycht be gottin in the tolbuthe for the tym be pub
lic warning of the belman / has gefin and grantit til Richart boyil
for the sustentacione of divine seruice as ane of the parrisch' clerkis the quartar
of the castelgate that Wil yung had with al profitis and dewiteis pertening
to the samyn becaus' the said William falyeit in his seruice making And
the said Richart sal mak diligent seruice tharfor in the qvere and parrisch'
kirk of this burgh' and al vthir seruice and wount et cetera

In the court haldin be the ballies of Abirdene in the tolbuthe on monundai the xiij
dai of marche the yer' forsaid Johne malisson calit toansuer' to the borgh' strekin
on him be Johne of lambynton' like as he was warnit be morice besat
seriand / comperit nocht / quhar'apon' the court avisit the ballies be decret of the
samen has chargit the said seriand to warn Johne malisson tocompere before
thaim in the court tobe haldin on monunday next tocum for day peremptour' to
ansuer' to the said borch'

Item the ballies has assignit til Johne of Kyntor monundai that next cumis
as dai peremptour til ansuer' to the chalance of Dauid marr' anent compt and
payment of ija barellis of salmond / and of the waring of xvj s' g'

The xv dai of marche In the balye court / gillegawdy convict be assis was
adiugit in amerciament for wranguis' intrometting with j barel of salt of Corne
lis hyne / and in ane vthir amerciment for strublance of the said cornelis And
for amendis of the party the assise has ordanit to put him in the goif and his
feit oute thar' toremain at the wil of the party and for certane tym ordanit be
the assis' Attour' thai haf ordanit for amendis to the toune / that quhat
tym the said gillegawdy fra thine furth beis fundin labourand at the
key outhir berand gude to the key or fra it / that he salbe tayn and
crovnit with paper oute of this toune for a yer' And quhat evir he be
that giffis him labour' ado in tym cuming to cary to the key or fra it ony
merchandice or gudis passand or cumand be sey / sal pay viij and vnforge
vin to the kirk wark et cetera because he is considerit a vnsufficent seruand

Item the said gillegawdy and scottis thome ilkane in amerciament for strublance
of byr

TheThis entry starts on page 240 and continues on page 239, as a result of the page being bound in backwards. xvj dai of marche / comperit before William blindsel ane of the ballies in Jugement
Wil andirson yungar and askit at him Jame arth' tobe callit to entir Wille
til his instance to free him anent the aldirman and Richert litstar like as it was orda
nit be assis the quhilk James beand callit and nocht comperit the said Wil andirson
protestit for remeid of law et cetera

In the court haldin be the baillies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xvij dai of marche the
yer' of god lxxxv / henry Johneson grantis him awand til / Robert ihoneson xvij
s' vj d' for the rest of payment of the bying of a gillate / the quhilk some'
he is chargit be William blindsel ane of the ballies topay within terme of law

The samen dai Johne of Kintor folowit Johne malisson be ane borgh' that he
has wrangwisly intromettit with iiijor barellis of salmond of his withoute his
command' / and the said Johne malisson askit ane lachfull dai til ansuer'
to the said borgh' / and the ballies be the decreit of the court has assignit til
him tharto monunday next tocum as day peremptour'

The ballies be the decrete of the court has assignit til Johne menyeis on the
behalf of meg the vaus his spous' as he that comperit for hir in Jugement
monunday next tocum for dai peremptour' til ansuer' to the borgh strekin be John'
thom menyeis apon hir for the wrangwis' haldin fra him of xxiij s' vj d'
for j meil of malt that scho bocht fra him

the xviij day of marche / James lesly Alexander reid gilbert the vaus Johne Wormot
and Johne colison amicabil compositouris chosin and sworn betuix Androw branche and Copyn
andreis skippar anent certane rekning of merchandice of bath the parties thai beand
ablist tovndirly thare deliuerence / quhilkis persons riply avisit has decretit and de
liuerit before the ballies in Jugement that the said skippar sal pay til Androu
branche vij li' x s' of scottis money

Item the assise has deliuerit that Wilyeam gelisson skippar of the feyr sal pay and
content til Johne low xxxv s' of the rest of j barel of salmond clamit
be the said John'

CuriaThe remainder of this court is on pages 945-6 (entries ARO-6-0945-01 to ARO-6-0945-07). legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die marcij
anno Domini supradicto /

quo die Actio prosecuta per Dauid marr' aduersus Johannem de
Kyntor penes ij barellas salmonum et xvj s' g' Respectuatur cum consensu parcium sub spe concordie
vsque diem iuridicum proximum post pascha in statu quo nunc est absque preiudicio parcium

Alexander chamer seriandus fatebatur se deuenisse plegius Alxr andree vaus penes alexandrum
rede pro vna bolla salis / quare precipitur eidem ad satisfaciendum seu satisfieri faciendum
andree infra terminum Juris
